    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.cascaded.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.cascaded.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CascadedAnimation
      <cascaded-animation> applies an animation on an array of elements with a delay between each.
      the delay defaults to 50ms.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FadeInAnimation
      <fade-in-animation> animates the opacity of an element from 0 to 1.
      class  FadeOutAnimation
      <fade-out-animation> animates the opacity of an element from 1 to 0.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.hero.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.hero.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeroAnimation
      <hero-animation> is a shared element animation that scales and transform an element such that it
      appears to be shared between two pages.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IronA11yAnnouncer
      iron-a11y-announcer is a singleton element that is intended to add a11y
      to features that require on-demand announcement from screen readers.
      class  IronA11yKeys
      iron-a11y-keys provides a normalized interface for processing keyboard commands that pertain to WAI-ARIA best
      practices      .
      class  IronAjax
      The iron-ajax element exposes network request functionality.
      class  IronAutogrowTextarea
      iron-autogrow-textarea is an element containing a textarea that grows in height as more
      lines of input are entered.
      class  IronCollapse
      iron-collapse creates a collapsible block of content.
      class  IronComponentPage
      Loads Polymer element and behavior documentation using
      Hydrolysis and renders a complete
      documentation page including demos (if available).
      class  IronDocProperty
      Renders documentation describing a specific property of an element.
      class  IronDocViewer
      Renders documentation describing an element’s API.
      class  IronDropdown
      <iron-dropdown> is a generalized element that is useful when you have
      hidden content (.dropdown-content) that is revealed due to some change in
      state that should cause it to do so.
      class  IronFlexLayout
      The <iron-flex-layout> component provides simple ways to use CSS flexible box layout, also known as flexbox.
      class  IronForm
      `<iron-form> is an HTML <form> element that can validate and submit any custom
      elements that implement Polymer.IronFormElementBehavior, as well as any
      native HTML elements.
      class  IronIcon
      The iron-icon element displays an icon.
      class  IronIcons
      iron-icons is a utility import that includes the definition for the iron-icon element, iron-iconset-svg element, as well as an import for the default icon set.
      class  IronIconset 
      class  IronIconsetSvg
      The iron-iconset-svg element allows users to define their own icon sets
      that contain svg icons.
      class  IronImage
      iron-image is an element for displaying an image that provides useful sizing and
      preloading options not found on the standard <img> tag.
      class  IronInput
      <iron-input> adds two-way binding and custom validators using Polymer.IronValidatorBehavior
      to <input>.
      class  IronList
      iron-list displays a virtual, ‘infinite’ list.
      class  IronLocalstorage
      Element access to Web Storage API (window.localStorage).
      class  IronMediaQuery
      iron-media-query can be used to data bind to a CSS media query.
      The query property is a bare CSS media query.
      The query-matches property is a boolean representing whether the page matches that media query.
      class  IronMeta
      iron-meta is a generic element you can use for sharing information across the DOM tree.
      It uses monostate pattern such that any
      instance of iron-meta has access to the shared
      information.
      class  IronMetaQuery
      iron-meta is a generic element you can use for sharing information across the DOM tree.
      It uses monostate pattern such that any
      instance of iron-meta has access to the shared
      information.
      class  IronOverlayBackdrop
      iron-overlay-backdrop is a backdrop used by Polymer.IronOverlayBehavior.
      class  IronPages
      iron-pages is used to select one of its children to show.
      class  IronRequest
      iron-request can be used to perform XMLHttpRequests.
      class  IronSelector
      iron-selector is an element which can be used to manage a list of elements
      that can be selected.
      class  IronSignals
      iron-signals provides basic publish-subscribe functionality.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.paper.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.paper.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PaperBadge
      <paper-badge> is a circular text badge that is displayed on the top right
      corner of an element, representing a status or a notification.
      class  PaperButton
      Material design: Buttons
      class  PaperCard
      Material Design: Cards
      class  PaperCheckbox
      Material design: Checkbox
      class  PaperDialog
      <paper-dialog> is a dialog with Material Design styling and optional animations when it is
      opened or closed.
      class  PaperDialogScrollable
      paper-dialog-scrollable implements a scrolling area used in a Material Design dialog.
      class  PaperDrawerPanel
      paper-drawer-panel contains a drawer panel and a main panel.
      class  PaperDropdownMenu
      paper-dropdown-menu is similar to a native browser select element.
      paper-dropdown-menu works with selectable content.
      class  PaperFab
      Material design: Floating Action Button
      class  PaperHeaderPanel
      paper-header-panel contains a header section and a content panel section.
      class  PaperIconButton
      Material design: Icon toggles
      class  PaperIconItem
      <paper-icon-item> is a convenience element to make an item with icon.
      class  PaperInput
      <paper-input> is a single-line text field with Material Design styling.
      class  PaperInputCharCounter
      <paper-input-char-counter> is a character counter for use with <paper-input-container>.
      class  PaperInputContainer
      <paper-input-container> is a container for a <label>, an <input is="iron-input"> or
      <iron-autogrow-textarea> and optional add-on elements such as an error message or character
      counter, used to implement Material Design text fields.
      class  PaperInputError
      <paper-input-error> is an error message for use with <paper-input-container>.
      class  PaperItem
      Material design: Lists
      class  PaperItemBody
      Use <paper-item-body> in a <paper-item> or <paper-icon-item> to make two- or
      three- line items.
      class  PaperMaterial
      Material design: Cards
      class  PaperMenu
      <paper-menu> implements an accessible menu control with Material Design styling.
      class  PaperMenuButton
      paper-menu-button allows one to compose a designated “trigger” element with
      another element that represents “content”, to create a dropdown menu that
      displays the “content” when the “trigger” is clicked.
      class  PaperMenuGrowHeightAnimation 
      class  PaperMenuGrowWidthAnimation 
      class  PaperMenuShrinkHeightAnimation 
      class  PaperMenuShrinkWidthAnimation 
      class  PaperProgress
      The progress bars are for situations where the percentage completed can be
      determined.
      class  PaperRadioButton
      Material design: Radio button
      class  PaperRadioGroup
      Material design: Radio button
      class  PaperRipple
      Material design: Surface reaction
      class  PaperScrollHeaderPanel
      paper-scroll-header-panel contains a header section and a content section.
      class  PaperSlider
      Material design: Sliders
      class  PaperSpinner
      Element providing material design circular spinner.
      class  PaperSubmenu
      <paper-submenu> is a nested menu inside of a parent <paper-menu>.
      class  PaperTab
      paper-tab is styled to look like a tab.
      class  PaperTabs
      Material design: Tabs
      class  PaperTabsBase
      This class will be extended by PaperTabs.java and contains a workaround to fix a problem with yellow line when a tab is selected.
      class  PaperTextarea
      <paper-textarea> is a multi-line text field with Material Design styling.
      class  PaperToast
      paper-toast provides a subtle notification toast.
      class  PaperToggleButton
      Material design: Switch
      class  PaperToolbar
      paper-toolbar is a horizontal bar containing items that can be used for
      label, navigation, search and actions.
      class  PaperTooltip
      Material design: Tooltips

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.reverse.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.reverse.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReverseRippleAnimation
      <reverse-ripple-animation> scales and transform an element such that it appears to ripple down from this element, to either
      a shared element, or a screen position.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.ripple.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.ripple.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RippleAnimation
      <ripple-animation> scales and transform an element such that it appears to ripple from either
      a shared element, or from a screen position, to full screen.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.scale.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.scale.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ScaleDownAnimation
      <scale-down-animation> animates the scale transform of an element from 1 to 0.
      class  ScaleUpAnimation
      <scale-up-animation> animates the scale transform of an element from 0 to 1.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.slide.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.slide.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SlideDownAnimation
      <slide-down-animation> animates the transform of an element from translateY(-100%) to none.
      The transformOrigin defaults to 50% 0.
      class  SlideFromLeftAnimation
      <slide-from-left-animation> animates the transform of an element from
      translateX(-100%) to none.
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideFromRightAnimation
      <slide-from-right-animation> animates the transform of an element from
      translateX(100%) to none.
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideLeftAnimation
      <slide-left-animation> animates the transform of an element from none to translateX(-100%).
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideRightAnimation
      <slide-right-animation> animates the transform of an element from none to translateX(100%).
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideUpAnimation
      <slide-up-animation> animates the transform of an element from translateY(0) to
      translateY(-100%).

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.transform.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.transform.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransformAnimation
      <transform-animation> animates a custom transform on an element.
